about_the_game:
Mollycoddle Mayhem is a couch co-op game for up to four players. Play by yourself or work as a team, you and your fellow guardians must cook, clean, and perform various babysitting tasks. Don't wait too long to change those diapers or the babies will get upset!

Demo contains:
-6 levels (3 from the tutorial, and 3 from the food court / mall)
-2 Unlocked items (coffee and the ghost blanket)
-Unlockable skins for the baby

Just a reminder you can get bonus coins for replaying the same level. Use bonus coins to:
-Unlock baby cosmetics
-Unlock the next level (if your score is too low)

short_description: Mollycoddle Mayhem is a couch co-op game for up to four players where you work together to spoil and pamper babies that have been anonymously abandoned. Cook, clean, change diapers, and perform various other tasks before the little ones get too upset.
